long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
42FM allows you to listen to music on Twitch with synchronization between users that use this extension.

Available commands:
- "!fm <youtube link here/title/youtube video id>"

Commands for broadcaster/mods
- "!fm help"
- "!fm pause"
- "!fm play"
- "!fm skip"
- "!fm clear"
